errors.durationLowerThanInterval: Duration between times cannot be lower than the selected interval
errors.paymentInvalid: Payment field cannot be left empty
errors.recipientInvalid: Please enter a valid Ethereum address
errors.stopTimeLowerThanStartTime: The stop time cannot be before the start time
errors.stopTimeInvalid: Stop time field cannot be left empty

input.dates: When should the stream start and when should it end?
input.rate: How much do you want to start paying?
input.recipient: What is the Ethereum address of the recipient?
input.token: What token do you want to use?

installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.

shareTwitterText: Check out @SablierApp to pay or be paid by-the-minute üí∏
stopAndWithdrawWarning: Are you sure? This action will stop the stream and withdraw {{ withdrawableLabel }} to your Ethereum wallet right now. If you do NOT stop the stream, you will earn  {{ leftoverIncomeLabel }} more by {{ stopTimeLabel }}.

tooltip.age:
The time that passed since the stream
has been started.
tooltip.flow:
The flow of a stream that pays you is said
to be Incoming. When you pay someone else,
the flow is said to be Outgoing.
tooltip.rate:
The rate at which the funds in the stream
are distributed. As time passes, the recipient
has the right to withdraw more money, while
the payer's share decreases. Any party can
terminate the stream at any time and funds will be
distributed proportionally at termination time.
tooltip.remaining:
The time remaining until the stream ends
and the recipient is able to cash out all of
the deposited funds.

wrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network
youAreOnTheWrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network. Please switch to the Main Ethereum Network.
